```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(extrafont)
# font_import()
loadfonts(device = "win")

library(osmdata)
library(sf)
library(tidyverse)
library(tmap)
library(wesanderson)

tmap_mode("view")
```

## Get Data

```{r}
# Get highway data from OSM

query <- getbb("Leuven, Belgium") %>% 
   opq() %>% 
   add_osm_feature("highway") %>% 
   osmdata_sf()

leuHighways <- query$osm_lines

```

```{r}
# Get highway data from OSM

queryW <- getbb("Leuven, Belgium") %>% 
   opq() %>% 
   add_osm_feature("traffic_calming", "island") %>% 
   osmdata_sf()

leuIslands <- queryW$osm_polygons

```

## Wrangle Data

```{r}
# Clean data

leuHighways <- leuHighways %>% 
  select(osm_id, geometry) %>% 
  st_transform(3857)

leuIslands <- leuIslands %>% 
  select(osm_id, geometry) %>% 
  st_transform(3857)
```

```{r}
# Now, I want a minimum bounding box

leuBound <- leuHighways %>% 
  st_bbox() %>% 
  st_as_sfc()

mapBound <- leuBound %>% 
  st_centroid() %>% 
  st_buffer(4500)

mapLimit <- leuBound %>% 
  st_centroid() %>% 
  st_buffer(5000)

```

```{r}
# Clip data to this area

leuHighwaysFilter <- leuHighways %>% 
  st_intersection(mapBound)

leuIslandsFilter <- leuIslands %>% 
  st_intersection(mapBound)

```

```{r}
# Draw buffers around the islands to highlight them

leuIslandsBuffer <- leuIslandsFilter %>% 
  st_buffer(250)
```

## Build Map

```{r}
# Build the base layer

vizBase <- tm_shape(mapLimit) +
  tm_fill(col = "#f1eee9") +
  tm_shape(mapBound) +
  tm_fill(col = "#f1eee9") +
  tm_layout(bg.color = "#f1eee9",
            frame = F,
            frame.lwd = NA,
            attr.outside = F,
            outer.margins = 0,
            asp = 0,
            scale = 0.8,
            main.title = "Traffic Islands",
            main.title.color = "#6a51a3",
            main.title.size = 1.75,
            main.title.fontfamily = "Arial Narrow",
            main.title.fontface = 2,
            main.title.position = "center",
            title = "Leuven",
            title.color = "#6a51a3",
            title.size = 1.25,
            title.position = c("center", "TOP"),
            title.fontface = 2,
            legend.position = c("right", "top"),
            legend.title.color = "#f1eee9") + 
  tm_credits("#30DayMapChallenge | Day 19 | Anirudh Govind | Nov 2021 | Map data Â© OpenStreetMap contributors and available from https://www.openstreetmap.org",
             col = "#6a51a3",
             size = 0.75,
             position = c("left", "bottom"),
             fontfamily = "Arial Narrow")
```

```{r}
# Build the other layers

vizIslands <- tm_shape(leuIslandsFilter) +
  tm_fill(col = "#6a51a3",
          legend.show = F) +
  tm_borders(lwd = 1,
             col = "#6a51a3") +
  tm_shape(leuHighwaysFilter) +
  tm_lines(col = "#969696",
           lwd = 0.05) +
  tm_shape(leuIslandsBuffer) +
  tm_borders(col = "#6a51a3",
             lty = "dashed")

```

```{r}
# Combine layers

viz <- vizBase + 
  vizIslands

```

## Export

```{r}
# Export the map as an image to upload onto twitter

tmap_save(tm = viz,
          filename = here::here("2021/exports/Day19.png"),
          dpi = 450,
          width = 200,
          height = 200,
          units = "mm")

```
